comment: 'Long term' side effects in vaccines are exceptionally rare to the point of almost being unheard of. There are possible side effects with all vaccines that will normally present in hours up to weeks after administration however with the Covid vaccines these are well documented.
amr:
# ::snt 'Long term' side effects in vaccines are exceptionally rare to the point of almost being unheard of. There are possible side effects with all vaccines that will normally present in hours up to weeks after administration however with the Covid vaccines these are well documented.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / rare-02
            :ARG1 (e / effect-03
                  :ARG0 (v / vaccine
                        :mod (a / all))
                  :mod (s / side)
                  :ARG1-of (l / long-03))
            :ARG2-of (h / have-degree-91
                  :ARG1 e
                  :ARG3 (t / to-the-point)
                  :ARG6 (p / possible-01
                        :ARG1 (h2 / hear-01
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG1 e
                              :mod (a2 / almost))))
            :degree (e2 / exceptional))
      :snt2 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (p2 / present-01
                  :ARG1 (e3 / effect-03
                        :ARG0 (v2 / vaccine
                              :mod (s2 / small-molecule
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Covid")))
                        :mod (s3 / side))
                  :ARG1-of (n2 / normal-02)
                  :time (a3 / after
                        :op1 (a4 / administer-01
                              :ARG1 v2)
                        :quant (u / up-to
                              :op1 (m2 / multiple
                                    :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                                          :quant 1
                                          :unit (h3 / hour))))))
            :ARG2 (d / document-01
                  :ARG1 e3
                  :ARG1-of (w / well-09)
                  :prep-with v2)))

comment: Some also need to understand that these ongoing trials are the same process other vaccines have had when they have been rolled out for use in the general population to ensure efficacy primarily and are nothing new.Safety concerns despite being understandable are unfounded
